OrgName.entry: ST THOMAS CHURCH - VENUES FOR HIRE

Desc.entry: Meeting rooms. Upper Hall, capacity 100. Room 1, capacity 50. Room 2, capacity 30. Lower Games Hall, capacity 100. Gilbert Room, capacity 70. All rooms have access to kitchen and toilets.

DisabledAccess.entry: Limited wheelchair access, upstairs rooms inaccessible to wheelchair users

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Thurs 9.30am-12noon & 1-5pm, Fri 9.30am-1pm (office times), available for hire Mon-Wed 8am-10pm, Thurs 8am-5pm, at other times by special arrangement.
